EmailTemplate.name: Customer Mailer Rel. 3.2.2 update.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: New VMTurbo Operations Manager Release
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
I just wanted to let you know that Operations Manager 3.2 Update 2 (Build 19954) has been published and it is highly recommended that you implement this latest release. You can find instructions for online and offline updates here <http://bit.ly/YMdFeS>.
We're also looking for your support. VMTurbo has been named a finalist <http://bit.ly/WWplvd> for the 2012 Tech Trailblazer awards in the virtualization category. Since you are a current user of Operations Manager, we are shamelessly soliciting your vote. To vote for VMTurbo, click here <http://bit.ly/TfSoHD>. You will receive an email to confirm your selection (so check your SPAM folder in case it gets stuck there). It's that easy. Any valid email is eligible, so please pass it on to the rest of your team.
Thanks, Steve Gorman VMTurbo Support
